forum.content:
The first round of NBA All Star voting is officially in! Here are the current top vote getters -

1. Kobe Bryant - 719,235
2. Stephen Curry - 510,202
3. LeBron James - 357,937
4. Kevin Durant - 349,473
5. Dwyane Wade - 300,595
6. Paul George - 283,785
7. Russell Westbrook - 267,699
8. Blake Griffin - 182,107
9. Kawhi Leonard - 164,521
10. Draymond Green - 160,350
11. Anthony Davis - 156,161
12. Andre Drummond - 148,278
13. Chris Paul - 146,335
14. Klay Thompson - 138,587
15. Kyrie Irving - 138,191

The public has spoken! And it looks like they want to see the Mamba one last time in the All-Star game.
forum.title: 明星賽票選
